title: Zyllion Shiatsu Back and Neck Massager with Heat - 3D Electric Kneading Deep Tissue Massage Pillow for Muscle Pain Relief, Brown, ZMA-13
features: Advanced 3D Deep Tissue Massage: Ease sore and stiff muscles with two soft silicone nodes on each side; Soothing kneading sensation penetrates through painful knots, especially on your lower back (lumbar area); Not cordless, must be plugged in

Recommended by Doctors of Physical Therapy: The electric massager is regularly used in clinics to alleviate chronic neck and backpain, arthritis, sciatica, stress, discomfort and headaches, a therapeutic solution to reduce muscle tension and soreness

Ergonomic & Versatile: Fits your body's contours: arms, hands, legs and even feet, to help relieve plantar fasciitis while the Velcro straps secure the massager to an office chair or car headrests (car adapter included)

Tested & Certified: Built with safety in mind, heat function has overheat protection, automatically shutting off the back massager after 20 minutes; Each side rotates every minute for safe and balanced comfort to help relieve muscle aches and spasms
Warranty Coverage: Includes an automatic 1-year warranty (from purchase date), if any issues arise within the first year, we'll replace your massager, cover or any accessories
